patient_info: Oral ulcer,Increased circulating renin level,Syncope,Palpitations,Diarrhea,Dyspnea,Hypokalemia,Hypomagnesemia,Generalized muscle weakness,Lower limb muscle weakness,Paroxysmal vertigo,T-wave inversion,Abnormality of urine calcium concentration,Nodular regenerative hyperplasia of liver,Dysesthesia,Amaurosis fugax
